name: PHProjectExtensionContext
desc: An object that provides Photos project extensions with access to the underlying project, as well as to the userâ€™s photo library for editing.

items.name: var project: PHProject
items.desc: A read-only version of the project being edited.

items.name: var photoLibrary: PHPhotoLibrary
items.desc: A read-only version of the photo library being modified.

items.name: func showEditor(for: PHAsset)
items.desc: Invokes the built-in photo editor for the given asset.

items.name: func updatedProjectInfo(from: PHProjectInfo?, completion: (PHProjectInfo?) -> Void) -> Progress
items.desc: Creates an updated PHProjectInfo instance from existing project information and current assets.
